alert.note: Alert for Lower St. Martin; St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 8:58PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Mary and southeastern St. Martin Parishes through 930 PM CST... At 858 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Belle River to near Bayou Vista to 11 miles east of Burns Point. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgan City, Patterson, Berwick, Stephensville, Bayou Vista, Amelia and Bayou Geneve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for south central Louisiana.
